meanings.definition: To feature on the front page of a website or publication.
meanings.sent1: The article was frontpaged on the website for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: She frontpaged the latest news on the newspaper's front page.
meanings.sent3: The cat frontpaged itself on the family photo album cover.
meanings.sent4: His performance frontpaged the event, stealing the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors frontpaged the magazine, catching readers' attention.

meanings.sent1: The frontpaged article was a hit among readers.
meanings.sent2: I found an old frontpaged from last year's edition.
meanings.sent3: The frontpaged reminded me of the good times we had.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of frontpageds showcased her talent.
meanings.sent5: The frontpaged brought back memories of that special day.
